scripts.build:css: lessc --autoprefix='last 2 versions' --clean-css='--s1' src/assets/css/style.less  dist/css/style.css && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/css/style.css 'dist/css/{name}{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:assets: mkdir dist && cp -r src/assets dist/assets && cp src/favicon.ico dist
scripts.build: npm run build:flickr && npm run build:assets && npm run build:markup
scripts.watch:build: watch 'npm run build:assets && npm run build:markup' src
